title: Ekko and Jinx

embed.description: " I used to have a crush, 'til ya started talkin' to the gun. " Ekko And Jinx

body: As soon as I learned that Ekko was from Zaun and had ties to Jinx, inspiration shot through the roof.

replies.body: This is really cool.  Can you tell us what the 'story' behind the piece is?  Why is Jinx going with Ekko?  Are they going to get the Z-Drive device?
More like Jinx gonna get the D-drive

*Ekko doesn't pull out*
*ults*
What does this mean??
This is why we don't let 12 year olds play this game.
It was a joke...
It's ok bud you'll understand later in life.
You assume I'm 12? I understand the joke...

> [{quoted}](name=Larger Sausages,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=99GpTGl1,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-16T01:39:01.294+0000)
>
> *Ekko doesn't pull out*
> *ults*

Why am I laughing at this...just why..
I feel like Jinx would encourage his explosion.
I thought she liked riding rockets? {{item:1058}}
Well Played.
Internet Winning Awards 2015
This is the greatest response i've ever seen on these boards.
YOU SAID IT BEFORE I COULD AAAAAAAAAAAH
But then you ulted and everything was okay :)
That awkward moment when a Rioter is asking a fan to write lore because we are so desperately needing some.

Yes. From Ekko's quotes, it's quite apparent he seeks to progress Zaun somehow. That's where most of this inspiration came from, but for the most part, it was a spur of the moment muse to draw the two.

> [{quoted}](name=Gett Jinxed,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=99GpTGl1,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2015-05-16T06:06:57.288+0000)
>
> Yes. From Ekko's quotes, it's quite apparent he seeks to progress Zaun somehow. That's where most of this inspiration came from, but for the most part, it was a spur of the moment muse to draw the two.

I get that from the quotes too - and I imagine the _"I had a crush - until you started talking to the gun."_ line factored in too.  I was just wondering about your head canon for this - he's giving Jinx a piggyback ride after all.  I was curious where they were going, or what they were doing.

(Note; I am _not_ a narrative-team Rioter - nor do I work on League directly (there's lots to do at Riot) so no, I'm not trying to get players to make the lore for me. ;)  I'm just impressed by the skill and creativity and wanted to know more about the drawing - it's cool and makes me curious!)
that depends, could we get some info on who the crap Ekko is?

I think it's riot's job to explain it to us ....
silly riot ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
me right now
I ship {{champion:161}} with{{champion:1}}
O.O
So I can give her first blood
Hmm, I swear ive seen a scene similar to this before, dunno from where

but but but, time scramble doesn't travel the brain
What if Ekko broke up with Jinx?
maybe he wanted to see other ppl, since she was already doing so (talking to Fishbones)
Is this Jinx?
I would say yes.  Looks a lot like her.
What if it's Jinxs sister, the inability to accept loss could be what drove Jinx crazy. Wow that got dark

_In the next issue..._

Caitlyn and Vi find out about a boy named Ekko, who leads the Zaunite delinquent gangs.  Discovering that Jinx may have frayed ties to that gang, they attempt to track down Ekko and bait him into coming to Piltover to flush out Jinx.  But Ekko has no fond feelings for Piltover either, and the stakes rise higher as this duel between Piltover Law Enforcement and Jinx turns into a triangle of chaos... and Vi is not acting her usual self.

The drama of Piltover comes to a boiling point in _League of Legends Vol. 6:  "The Lost Kids"_, in your local comic store June 1st!

But Ekko has no fond feelings for Piltover either, and the stakes rise higher as this duel between Piltover Law Enforcement and Jinx turns into a triangle of chaos... and Vi is not acting her usual self.

im also wondering about the dead kid, the goggles and the mural
What if the kid was Jinx Sister? And her demise caused a mental breakdown to Jinx who then started to invade Piltover?
Just let them stay friends only. I really just wanna pretend something can go right for me and not go up in flames for once. Riot don't. ;(
{{champion:201}} "Your hair. . . we do not see things like this in the Freljord."
